name: Untorch
description:
Untorch is a local multiplay "capture the flag" platform game.

two guys burn or water the trees and kill base each other.

If you enjoy with burn? on the left side. otherwise, on the right side of keyboard.

Key List

Left Player :

Move - W A S D

Action - F (Attack), G (Jump)

Right Player :

Move - Arrows

Action - O (Attack), P (Jump)

Let's fire or water in the Forest!
